os_list.name: Receipt Scanner OS
os_list.description: Raspberry Pi Receipt Scanner with AI Camera, OCR, and Wi-Fi Hotspot
os_list.description_long:
Turn your Raspberry Pi 5 with AI Camera Module into a self-contained receipt scanner. Features:

• One-click capture with libcamera
• OCR with Tesseract for automatic data extraction
• Built-in Wi-Fi hotspot (SSID: Receipt-Scanner)
• Web interface at 192.168.4.1
• SQLite and CSV data storage
• Battery monitoring and safe shutdown support

Perfect for offline receipt management without requiring external network access.
